spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall room zoning roughly matches (left bedroom + bath/office strip + right bedroom + open living/dining/kitchen), but several plan-to-render mismatches: corridor and central hall widths are enlarged, shifting wall positions (E4). Door locations/swing logic do not consistently match the 2D plan (notably along the top corridor and into the right bedroom/hall) (E2/E3). Window placement is significantly inaccurate: the 2D plan shows windows on the top edge (bath/office) and a kitchen/sink-side opening, while the render primarily shows right-side glazing and omits/relocates others (E1/E2).

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness is mostly consistent and clean, but multiple openings/doors appear added or moved relative to the plan (E2/E5). Adjacencies are mostly preserved (bath and office remain between bedrooms; open area remains on the right), yet exact wall breaks and doorway connections differ (E2). No major room is completely missing, but some plan-defined boundary/partition behaviors (living room partial enclosure) are simplified/shifted (E2/E4).

furniture_mapping.notes: Key furniture types are present (beds, dining table, sofa), but several placements and items do not match the 2D plan: the right bedroom’s desk/corner workstation is not clearly represented, kitchen appliance/sink positioning differs from the plan, and living room media/partition elements are simplified (E1/E2). Some scale relationships (hall vs. room usable area) appear inconsistent with the plan (E4).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Render is clean with consistent materials and good lighting. Camera is a reasonable isometric-like view, though it reads as mild perspective rather than strict isometric/orthographic (E6). Geometry is mostly artifact-free and visually clear, but simplified openings/frames reduce plan legibility.

detected_errors.description: Corridor/central hall proportions are inflated relative to the 2D plan, shifting perceived room sizes (notably the central circulation and right-side spaces).
Multiple door positions along the top corridor and into adjacent rooms do not align with the 2D plan’s doorway locations.
Several hinged door swing/orientation cues differ from the 2D plan (door arcs/opening direction not preserved).
Top-edge windows shown in the 2D plan (bath/office) are missing in the 3D render.
Right-side bedroom glazing is not placed/segmented to match the 2D plan’s window layout.
Kitchen fixtures (sink/stove/counter run) do not match the 2D plan’s bottom-right kitchen arrangement.
Plan-specific furniture elements (e.g., right bedroom corner desk/workstation and some living room media/partition details) are missing or not clearly represented.
At least one opening/doorway appears present in the render that is not clearly supported by the 2D plan layout.
View is not strictly orthographic/isometric; mild perspective reduces faithful plan-to-3D geometric verification.
